title: WTB a large grouping if ROSE PCs
author: BeanTown

posts.post_title: WTB a large grouping if ROSE PCs
posts.post_content: Are there any large collections out there of rose postcards (baseball players) that want to cash out?  Commons or HOFers are all welcomed.

Please stop seeking out rare baseball postcards.

May I suggest t206 instead?

Thank you for your consideration.
